name: Root Saviour
description:
ENTER FULLSCREEN

Root Saviors is a 2D platform game, its character is a mushroom which must interact with the map to obtain the amber and deliver it to a root that needs it, thus gaining the level. The player has a set of movements and an attack that will help him overcome the difficulties found on the map.

  • Michael Alexander Ardila Villamizar ( Programer )
  • John Sebastian Vera Quintero ( Animator ) 
  • Andres Felipe Echeverria Rueda ( Concept Artist ) 
  • Carlos Andres Gutierrez Benavides ( Programer ) 
  • Cristian David Pacheco Santos ( Animator, Pixel Artist) 
  • Adrian Esteban Godoy  ( Mussician)
